example.name: RGB Backlight 16x2 LCD Display
example.description: JHD1313M1 has two I2C addreses: one belongs to a controller, very similar to the upm::Lcm1602 LCD driver, that controls the HD44780-based display, and the other controls only the backlight. This module was tested with the Seeed Grove LCD RGB Backlight v2.0 display that requires 5V to operate.
